description: Phase E Drift Detection - Policy-driven thresholds (no magic numbers)

escalation_levels.HALT: Log + stop execution + require human override

invariants: INV-DRIFT-001: Detector MUST be read-only (never modifies BUILD artifacts)
INV-DRIFT-002: All thresholds MUST come from policy (no hardcoded values)
INV-DRIFT-003: Detection MUST be deterministic (same input = same output)
INV-DRIFT-004: Chain breaks MUST escalate to HALT immediately
INV-DRIFT-005: All drift events MUST include manifest_ref for traceability
INV-DRIFT-006: Decisional drift MUST detect new verdict categories when policy forbids
INV-DRIFT-007: Usage drift MUST detect repetition exceeding τ_max_repetitions
